TEXT.English: Miners near the city of %s2_city have found a strange new mineral all over the mine. They call it Uranium, and it glows slightly in the dark. Unfortunately it is slowly poisoning them and their tools. What shall we do?
TEXT.French: Miners near the city of %s2_city have found a strange new mineral all over the mine. They call it Uranium, and it glows slightly in the dark. Unfortunately it is slowly poisoning them and their tools. What shall we do?
TEXT.German: Miners near the city of %s2_city have found a strange new mineral all over the mine. They call it Uranium, and it glows slightly in the dark. Unfortunately it is slowly poisoning them and their tools. What shall we do?
TEXT.Italian: Miners near the city of %s2_city have found a strange new mineral all over the mine. They call it Uranium, and it glows slightly in the dark. Unfortunately it is slowly poisoning them and their tools. What shall we do?
TEXT.Spanish: Miners near the city of %s2_city have found a strange new mineral all over the mine. They call it Uranium, and it glows slightly in the dark. Unfortunately it is slowly poisoning them and their tools. What shall we do?

TEXT.English: Our Earth adepts should be able to find a way to use this Uranium safely.
TEXT.French: Our Earth adepts should be able to find a way to use this Uranium safely.
TEXT.German: Our Earth adepts should be able to find a way to use this Uranium safely.
TEXT.Italian: Our Earth adepts should be able to find a way to use this Uranium safely.
TEXT.Spanish: Our Earth adepts should be able to find a way to use this Uranium safely.

TEXT.English: Station a Life adept at the mine to keep the miners healthy.
TEXT.French: Station a Life adept at the mine to keep the miners healthy.
TEXT.German: Station a Life adept at the mine to keep the miners healthy.
TEXT.Italian: Station a Life adept at the mine to keep the miners healthy.
TEXT.Spanish: Station a Life adept at the mine to keep the miners healthy.

TEXT.English: Safety first - take the necessary precautions to protect our miners.
TEXT.French: Safety first - take the necessary precautions to protect our miners.
TEXT.German: Safety first - take the necessary precautions to protect our miners.
TEXT.Italian: Safety first - take the necessary precautions to protect our miners.
TEXT.Spanish: Safety first - take the necessary precautions to protect our miners.

TEXT.English: Keep it quiet, but KEEP them working.
TEXT.French: Keep it quiet, but KEEP them working.
TEXT.German: Keep it quiet, but KEEP them working.
TEXT.Italian: Keep it quiet, but KEEP them working.
TEXT.Spanish: Keep it quiet, but KEEP them working.

TEXT.English: A desert area floodplain near the city of %s2_city has a thick, black, stinking, oily liquid welling up from the ground in many places. It is reducing available farmland.
TEXT.French: A desert area floodplain near the city of %s2_city has a thick, black, stinking, oily liquid welling up from the ground in many places. It is reducing available farmland.
TEXT.German: A desert area floodplain near the city of %s2_city has a thick, black, stinking, oily liquid welling up from the ground in many places. It is reducing available farmland.
TEXT.Italian: A desert area floodplain near the city of %s2_city has a thick, black, stinking, oily liquid welling up from the ground in many places. It is reducing available farmland.
TEXT.Spanish: A desert area floodplain near the city of %s2_city has a thick, black, stinking, oily liquid welling up from the ground in many places. It is reducing available farmland.

TEXT.English: We'll never find a use for this worthless "oil".
TEXT.French: We'll never find a use for this worthless "oil".
TEXT.German: We'll never find a use for this worthless "oil".
TEXT.Italian: We'll never find a use for this worthless "oil".
TEXT.Spanish: We'll never find a use for this worthless "oil".

TEXT.English: I wonder if this "oil" burns?
TEXT.French: I wonder if this "oil" burns?
TEXT.German: I wonder if this "oil" burns?
TEXT.Italian: I wonder if this "oil" burns?
TEXT.Spanish: I wonder if this "oil" burns?

TEXT.English: Hmmm, this "oil" may help us lubricate our machinery better.
TEXT.French: Hmmm, this "oil" may help us lubricate our machinery better.
TEXT.German: Hmmm, this "oil" may help us lubricate our machinery better.
TEXT.Italian: Hmmm, this "oil" may help us lubricate our machinery better.
TEXT.Spanish: Hmmm, this "oil" may help us lubricate our machinery better.

TEXT.English: This "oil" may help us lubricate our golems and machinery.
TEXT.French: This "oil" may help us lubricate our golems and machinery.
TEXT.German: This "oil" may help us lubricate our golems and machinery.
TEXT.Italian: This "oil" may help us lubricate our golems and machinery.
TEXT.Spanish: This "oil" may help us lubricate our golems and machinery.

TEXT.English: Massive storms are slowly destroying our windmills near the city of %s2_city. Eyewitnesses say the winds sound like they come from the very Vaults of Hell. What can we do?
TEXT.French: Massive storms are slowly destroying our windmills near the city of %s2_city. Eyewitnesses say the winds sound like they come from the very Vaults of Hell. What can we do?
TEXT.German: Massive storms are slowly destroying our windmills near the city of %s2_city. Eyewitnesses say the winds sound like they come from the very Vaults of Hell. What can we do?
TEXT.Italian: Massive storms are slowly destroying our windmills near the city of %s2_city. Eyewitnesses say the winds sound like they come from the very Vaults of Hell. What can we do?
TEXT.Spanish: Massive storms are slowly destroying our windmills near the city of %s2_city. Eyewitnesses say the winds sound like they come from the very Vaults of Hell. What can we do?

TEXT.English: Our Air adepts can redirect the winds until the storms subside.
TEXT.French: Our Air adepts can redirect the winds until the storms subside.
TEXT.German: Our Air adepts can redirect the winds until the storms subside.
TEXT.Italian: Our Air adepts can redirect the winds until the storms subside.
TEXT.Spanish: Our Air adepts can redirect the winds until the storms subside.

TEXT.English: Sacrifice a soul to appease these winds.
TEXT.French: Sacrifice a soul to appease these winds.
TEXT.German: Sacrifice a soul to appease these winds.
TEXT.Italian: Sacrifice a soul to appease these winds.
TEXT.Spanish: Sacrifice a soul to appease these winds.

TEXT.English: What can we do? Let the storms run their course and rebuild.
TEXT.French: What can we do? Let the storms run their course and rebuild.
TEXT.German: What can we do? Let the storms run their course and rebuild.
TEXT.Italian: What can we do? Let the storms run their course and rebuild.
TEXT.Spanish: What can we do? Let the storms run their course and rebuild.

TEXT.English: Logging operations in the forests near the city of %s2_city are in danger. Treants are enraged at tree cuttings and their attacks have caught us by surprise. Loggers are fleeing and buildings being destroyed.
TEXT.French: Logging operations in the forests near the city of %s2_city are in danger. Treants are enraged at tree cuttings and their attacks have caught us by surprise. Loggers are fleeing and buildings being destroyed.
TEXT.German: Logging operations in the forests near the city of %s2_city are in danger. Treants are enraged at tree cuttings and their attacks have caught us by surprise. Loggers are fleeing and buildings being destroyed.
TEXT.Italian: Logging operations in the forests near the city of %s2_city are in danger. Treants are enraged at tree cuttings and their attacks have caught us by surprise. Loggers are fleeing and buildings being destroyed.
TEXT.Spanish: Logging operations in the forests near the city of %s2_city are in danger. Treants are enraged at tree cuttings and their attacks have caught us by surprise. Loggers are fleeing and buildings being destroyed.

TEXT.English: Quick, our Nature adepts should be able to calm them down.
TEXT.French: Quick, our Nature adepts should be able to calm them down.
TEXT.German: Quick, our Nature adepts should be able to calm them down.
TEXT.Italian: Quick, our Nature adepts should be able to calm them down.
TEXT.Spanish: Quick, our Nature adepts should be able to calm them down.

TEXT.English: Rush our priests there to convince the treants we replant as well as cut.
TEXT.French: Rush our priests there to convince the treants we replant as well as cut.
TEXT.German: Rush our priests there to convince the treants we replant as well as cut.
TEXT.Italian: Rush our priests there to convince the treants we replant as well as cut.
TEXT.Spanish: Rush our priests there to convince the treants we replant as well as cut.

TEXT.English: Our troops cannot reach there in time. We shall just have to rebuild our lumbermills.
TEXT.French: Our troops cannot reach there in time. We shall just have to rebuild our lumbermills.
TEXT.German: Our troops cannot reach there in time. We shall just have to rebuild our lumbermills.
TEXT.Italian: Our troops cannot reach there in time. We shall just have to rebuild our lumbermills.
TEXT.Spanish: Our troops cannot reach there in time. We shall just have to rebuild our lumbermills.

TEXT.English: Treants enraged by tree cuttings have attacked the %s1_civ_adjective logging operations.
TEXT.French: Treants enraged by tree cuttings have attacked the %s1_civ_adjective logging operations.
TEXT.German: Treants enraged by tree cuttings have attacked the %s1_civ_adjective logging operations.
TEXT.Italian: Treants enraged by tree cuttings have attacked the %s1_civ_adjective logging operations.
TEXT.Spanish: Treants enraged by tree cuttings have attacked the %s1_civ_adjective logging operations.

TEXT.English: An unexpectedly fierce storm has struck land near the city of %s2_city, devastating our coastal waters.
TEXT.French: An unexpectedly fierce storm has struck land near the city of %s2_city, devastating our coastal waters.
TEXT.German: An unexpectedly fierce storm has struck land near the city of %s2_city, devastating our coastal waters.
TEXT.Italian: An unexpectedly fierce storm has struck land near the city of %s2_city, devastating our coastal waters.
TEXT.Spanish: An unexpectedly fierce storm has struck land near the city of %s2_city, devastating our coastal waters.

TEXT.English: A disaster. We shall have to repair or rebuild almost everything there.
TEXT.French: A disaster. We shall have to repair or rebuild almost everything there.
TEXT.German: A disaster. We shall have to repair or rebuild almost everything there.
TEXT.Italian: A disaster. We shall have to repair or rebuild almost everything there.
TEXT.Spanish: A disaster. We shall have to repair or rebuild almost everything there.

TEXT.English: A disaster. We shall have to rebuild our pirate cove.
TEXT.French: A disaster. We shall have to rebuild our pirate cove.
TEXT.German: A disaster. We shall have to rebuild our pirate cove.
TEXT.Italian: A disaster. We shall have to rebuild our pirate cove.
TEXT.Spanish: A disaster. We shall have to rebuild our pirate cove.

TEXT.English: An uxpectedly fierce storm has devastated %s1_civ_adjective fishing operations.
TEXT.French: An uxpectedly fierce storm has devastated %s1_civ_adjective fishing operations.
TEXT.German: An uxpectedly fierce storm has devastated %s1_civ_adjective fishing operations.
TEXT.Italian: An uxpectedly fierce storm has devastated %s1_civ_adjective fishing operations.
TEXT.Spanish: An uxpectedly fierce storm has devastated %s1_civ_adjective fishing operations.

TEXT.English: The swamps near the city of %s2_city have an abundant supply of peat.
TEXT.French: The swamps near the city of %s2_city have an abundant supply of peat.
TEXT.German: The swamps near the city of %s2_city have an abundant supply of peat.
TEXT.Italian: The swamps near the city of %s2_city have an abundant supply of peat.
TEXT.Spanish: The swamps near the city of %s2_city have an abundant supply of peat.

TEXT.English: That's good news.
TEXT.French: That's good news.
TEXT.German: That's good news.
TEXT.Italian: That's good news.
TEXT.Spanish: That's good news.

TEXT.English: Millers using the windmills near the city of %s2_city have discovered a more efficient way to make bread flour with less waste.
TEXT.French: Millers using the windmills near the city of %s2_city have discovered a more efficient way to make bread flour with less waste.
TEXT.German: Millers using the windmills near the city of %s2_city have discovered a more efficient way to make bread flour with less waste.
TEXT.Italian: Millers using the windmills near the city of %s2_city have discovered a more efficient way to make bread flour with less waste.
TEXT.Spanish: Millers using the windmills near the city of %s2_city have discovered a more efficient way to make bread flour with less waste.

TEXT.English: Now all we need is the jug of wine and thou, as the poet once said.
TEXT.French: Now all we need is the jug of wine and thou, as the poet once said.
TEXT.German: Now all we need is the jug of wine and thou, as the poet once said.
TEXT.Italian: Now all we need is the jug of wine and thou, as the poet once said.
TEXT.Spanish: Now all we need is the jug of wine and thou, as the poet once said.

TEXT.English: Small amounts of silver have been discovered near the workshops of the city of %s2_city. The workshops are using it to increase the value of their products.
TEXT.French: Small amounts of silver have been discovered near the workshops of the city of %s2_city. The workshops are using it to increase the value of their products.
TEXT.German: Small amounts of silver have been discovered near the workshops of the city of %s2_city. The workshops are using it to increase the value of their products.
TEXT.Italian: Small amounts of silver have been discovered near the workshops of the city of %s2_city. The workshops are using it to increase the value of their products.
TEXT.Spanish: Small amounts of silver have been discovered near the workshops of the city of %s2_city. The workshops are using it to increase the value of their products.

TEXT.English: Good, but don't let it start a silver rush.
TEXT.French: Good, but don't let it start a silver rush.
TEXT.German: Good, but don't let it start a silver rush.
TEXT.Italian: Good, but don't let it start a silver rush.
TEXT.Spanish: Good, but don't let it start a silver rush.

TEXT.English: The swamps near the city of %s2_city have a plethora of large edible frogs. Their legs have become a delicacy.
TEXT.French: The swamps near the city of %s2_city have a plethora of large edible frogs. Their legs have become a delicacy.
TEXT.German: The swamps near the city of %s2_city have a plethora of large edible frogs. Their legs have become a delicacy.
TEXT.Italian: The swamps near the city of %s2_city have a plethora of large edible frogs. Their legs have become a delicacy.
TEXT.Spanish: The swamps near the city of %s2_city have a plethora of large edible frogs. Their legs have become a delicacy.

TEXT.English: They do taste like chicken, don't they?
TEXT.French: They do taste like chicken, don't they?
TEXT.German: They do taste like chicken, don't they?
TEXT.Italian: They do taste like chicken, don't they?
TEXT.Spanish: They do taste like chicken, don't they?

TEXT.English: Frog legs have become a delicacy in %s1_civ_adjective lands.
TEXT.French: Frog legs have become a delicacy in %s1_civ_adjective lands.
TEXT.German: Frog legs have become a delicacy in %s1_civ_adjective lands.
TEXT.Italian: Frog legs have become a delicacy in %s1_civ_adjective lands.
TEXT.Spanish: Frog legs have become a delicacy in %s1_civ_adjective lands.

TEXT.English: An issue long thought decided is being discussed again amongst our people - risen from the dead, so to speak. Heated arguments are breaking out daily, dividing family and friends.
TEXT.French: An issue long thought decided is being discussed again amongst our people - risen from the dead, so to speak. Heated arguments are breaking out daily, dividing family and friends.
TEXT.German: An issue long thought decided is being discussed again amongst our people - risen from the dead, so to speak. Heated arguments are breaking out daily, dividing family and friends.
TEXT.Italian: An issue long thought decided is being discussed again amongst our people - risen from the dead, so to speak. Heated arguments are breaking out daily, dividing family and friends.
TEXT.Spanish: An issue long thought decided is being discussed again amongst our people - risen from the dead, so to speak. Heated arguments are breaking out daily, dividing family and friends.

TEXT.English: Our stability is more important than those raising this issue. So let's have lunch.
TEXT.French: Our stability is more important than those raising this issue. So let's have lunch.
TEXT.German: Our stability is more important than those raising this issue. So let's have lunch.
TEXT.Italian: Our stability is more important than those raising this issue. So let's have lunch.
TEXT.Spanish: Our stability is more important than those raising this issue. So let's have lunch.

TEXT.English: I have an idea for a series of public ice sculptures using those causing this unrest.
TEXT.French: I have an idea for a series of public ice sculptures using those causing this unrest.
TEXT.German: I have an idea for a series of public ice sculptures using those causing this unrest.
TEXT.Italian: I have an idea for a series of public ice sculptures using those causing this unrest.
TEXT.Spanish: I have an idea for a series of public ice sculptures using those causing this unrest.

TEXT.English: Let's show the people real necromancy and stop this irritation.
TEXT.French: Let's show the people real necromancy and stop this irritation.
TEXT.German: Let's show the people real necromancy and stop this irritation.
TEXT.Italian: Let's show the people real necromancy and stop this irritation.
TEXT.Spanish: Let's show the people real necromancy and stop this irritation.

TEXT.English: It's hard to talk and spread dissension when your lungs are filled with water.
TEXT.French: It's hard to talk and spread dissension when your lungs are filled with water.
TEXT.German: It's hard to talk and spread dissension when your lungs are filled with water.
TEXT.Italian: It's hard to talk and spread dissension when your lungs are filled with water.
TEXT.Spanish: It's hard to talk and spread dissension when your lungs are filled with water.

TEXT.English: Dissent of such a random nature is a threat to our society and will not be tolerated. Crackdown on this and train our priests better to avoid this happening ever again.
TEXT.French: Dissent of such a random nature is a threat to our society and will not be tolerated. Crackdown on this and train our priests better to avoid this happening ever again.
TEXT.German: Dissent of such a random nature is a threat to our society and will not be tolerated. Crackdown on this and train our priests better to avoid this happening ever again.
TEXT.Italian: Dissent of such a random nature is a threat to our society and will not be tolerated. Crackdown on this and train our priests better to avoid this happening ever again.
TEXT.Spanish: Dissent of such a random nature is a threat to our society and will not be tolerated. Crackdown on this and train our priests better to avoid this happening ever again.

TEXT.English: Just let it be - maybe it will die away again.
TEXT.French: Just let it be - maybe it will die away again.
TEXT.German: Just let it be - maybe it will die away again.
TEXT.Italian: Just let it be - maybe it will die away again.
TEXT.Spanish: Just let it be - maybe it will die away again.

TEXT.English: The water supplies for our city of %s2_city have somehow became tainted - possibly they were poisoned by one of our enemies. Water shortages are widespread.
TEXT.French: The water supplies for our city of %s2_city have somehow became tainted - possibly they were poisoned by one of our enemies. Water shortages are widespread.
TEXT.German: The water supplies for our city of %s2_city have somehow became tainted - possibly they were poisoned by one of our enemies. Water shortages are widespread.
TEXT.Italian: The water supplies for our city of %s2_city have somehow became tainted - possibly they were poisoned by one of our enemies. Water shortages are widespread.
TEXT.Spanish: The water supplies for our city of %s2_city have somehow became tainted - possibly they were poisoned by one of our enemies. Water shortages are widespread.

TEXT.English: Have our Water adepts purify our water supplies.
TEXT.French: Have our Water adepts purify our water supplies.
TEXT.German: Have our Water adepts purify our water supplies.
TEXT.Italian: Have our Water adepts purify our water supplies.
TEXT.Spanish: Have our Water adepts purify our water supplies.

TEXT.English: The powers of Aquae Sucellus will have already removed any and all poisons.
TEXT.French: The powers of Aquae Sucellus will have already removed any and all poisons.
TEXT.German: The powers of Aquae Sucellus will have already removed any and all poisons.
TEXT.Italian: The powers of Aquae Sucellus will have already removed any and all poisons.
TEXT.Spanish: The powers of Aquae Sucellus will have already removed any and all poisons.

TEXT.English: Begin cleansing operations immediately, and ration our water supplies until done.
TEXT.French: Begin cleansing operations immediately, and ration our water supplies until done.
TEXT.German: Begin cleansing operations immediately, and ration our water supplies until done.
TEXT.Italian: Begin cleansing operations immediately, and ration our water supplies until done.
TEXT.Spanish: Begin cleansing operations immediately, and ration our water supplies until done.

TEXT.English: Begin rationing our water supplies until nature herself finally cleans them.
TEXT.French: Begin rationing our water supplies until nature herself finally cleans them.
TEXT.German: Begin rationing our water supplies until nature herself finally cleans them.
TEXT.Italian: Begin rationing our water supplies until nature herself finally cleans them.
TEXT.Spanish: Begin rationing our water supplies until nature herself finally cleans them.

TEXT.English: The water supplies for our city of %s2_city have finally become pure again.
TEXT.French: The water supplies for our city of %s2_city have finally become pure again.
TEXT.German: The water supplies for our city of %s2_city have finally become pure again.
TEXT.Italian: The water supplies for our city of %s2_city have finally become pure again.
TEXT.Spanish: The water supplies for our city of %s2_city have finally become pure again.

TEXT.Spanish: The water supplies for our city of %s2_city have finally become pure again.

TEXT.English: This city (only) has a -2 health penalty for 5 turns.
TEXT.French: This city (only) has a -2 health penalty for 5 turns.
TEXT.German: This city (only) has a -2 health penalty for 5 turns.
TEXT.Italian: This city (only) has a -2 health penalty for 5 turns.
TEXT.Spanish: This city (only) has a -2 health penalty for 5 turns.

TEXT.English: This city (only) has a -3 health penalty and -1 anger for 10 turns.
TEXT.French: This city (only) has a -3 health penalty and -1 anger for 10 turns.
TEXT.German: This city (only) has a -3 health penalty and -1 anger for 10 turns.
TEXT.Italian: This city (only) has a -3 health penalty and -1 anger for 10 turns.
TEXT.Spanish: This city (only) has a -3 health penalty and -1 anger for 10 turns.

TEXT.English: The %s1_civ_adjective Empire has had a scandal break out that somehow it looks like our diplomats there were involved in. Our relations with them will suffer unless we can prove we're innocent. We are, right?
TEXT.French: The %s1_civ_adjective Empire has had a scandal break out that somehow it looks like our diplomats there were involved in. Our relations with them will suffer unless we can prove we're innocent. We are, right?
TEXT.German: The %s1_civ_adjective Empire has had a scandal break out that somehow it looks like our diplomats there were involved in. Our relations with them will suffer unless we can prove we're innocent. We are, right?
TEXT.Italian: The %s1_civ_adjective Empire has had a scandal break out that somehow it looks like our diplomats there were involved in. Our relations with them will suffer unless we can prove we're innocent. We are, right?
TEXT.Spanish: The %s1_civ_adjective Empire has had a scandal break out that somehow it looks like our diplomats there were involved in. Our relations with them will suffer unless we can prove we're innocent. We are, right?

TEXT.English: Our Mind adepts will prove we are innocent.
TEXT.French: Our Mind adepts will prove we are innocent.
TEXT.German: Our Mind adepts will prove we are innocent.
TEXT.Italian: Our Mind adepts will prove we are innocent.
TEXT.Spanish: Our Mind adepts will prove we are innocent.

TEXT.English: We shall prove another civilization caused this.
TEXT.French: We shall prove another civilization caused this.
TEXT.German: We shall prove another civilization caused this.
TEXT.Italian: We shall prove another civilization caused this.
TEXT.Spanish: We shall prove another civilization caused this.

TEXT.English: We are innocent, but have no proof.
TEXT.French: We are innocent, but have no proof.
TEXT.German: We are innocent, but have no proof.
TEXT.Italian: We are innocent, but have no proof.
TEXT.Spanish: We are innocent, but have no proof.

TEXT.English: Yes, we're innocent. But tell them we did it - and that they deserved it.
TEXT.French: Yes, we're innocent. But tell them we did it - and that they deserved it.
TEXT.German: Yes, we're innocent. But tell them we did it - and that they deserved it.
TEXT.Italian: Yes, we're innocent. But tell them we did it - and that they deserved it.
TEXT.Spanish: Yes, we're innocent. But tell them we did it - and that they deserved it.

TEXT.English: The %s1_civ_adjective ambassador has been implicated in a scandal involving important people in our government. This has adversely affected our relations with their country.
TEXT.French: The %s1_civ_adjective ambassador has been implicated in a scandal involving important people in our government. This has adversely affected our relations with their country.
TEXT.German: The %s1_civ_adjective ambassador has been implicated in a scandal involving important people in our government. This has adversely affected our relations with their country.
TEXT.Italian: The %s1_civ_adjective ambassador has been implicated in a scandal involving important people in our government. This has adversely affected our relations with their country.
TEXT.Spanish: The %s1_civ_adjective ambassador has been implicated in a scandal involving important people in our government. This has adversely affected our relations with their country.

TEXT.English: A group of cultists in an Ancient Tower have summoned a Demon from Hell. Fortunately a band of adventurers killed the cultists and trapped the demon in the Tower.
TEXT.French: A group of cultists in an Ancient Tower have summoned a Demon from Hell. Fortunately a band of adventurers killed the cultists and trapped the demon in the Tower.
TEXT.German: A group of cultists in an Ancient Tower have summoned a Demon from Hell. Fortunately a band of adventurers killed the cultists and trapped the demon in the Tower.
TEXT.Italian: A group of cultists in an Ancient Tower have summoned a Demon from Hell. Fortunately a band of adventurers killed the cultists and trapped the demon in the Tower.
TEXT.Spanish: A group of cultists in an Ancient Tower have summoned a Demon from Hell. Fortunately a band of adventurers killed the cultists and trapped the demon in the Tower.

TEXT.English: Let no one enter the Ancient Tower until we can kill or banish it.
TEXT.French: Let no one enter the Ancient Tower until we can kill or banish it.
TEXT.German: Let no one enter the Ancient Tower until we can kill or banish it.
TEXT.Italian: Let no one enter the Ancient Tower until we can kill or banish it.
TEXT.Spanish: Let no one enter the Ancient Tower until we can kill or banish it.

TEXT.English: A weakened (-60% strength) and immobile demon appears in the tower.
TEXT.French: A weakened (-60% strength) and immobile demon appears in the tower.
TEXT.German: A weakened (-60% strength) and immobile demon appears in the tower.
TEXT.Italian: A weakened (-60% strength) and immobile demon appears in the tower.
TEXT.Spanish: A weakened (-60% strength) and immobile demon appears in the tower.

TEXT.English: We have discovered a cache of pre-Age of Ice books in an Ancient Tower. The books are decorated with gold and jewels, but fragile - reading them may end up destroying them. And they may be dangerous to read. What shall we do?
TEXT.French: We have discovered a cache of pre-Age of Ice books in an Ancient Tower. The books are decorated with gold and jewels, but fragile - reading them may end up destroying them. And they may be dangerous to read. What shall we do?
TEXT.German: We have discovered a cache of pre-Age of Ice books in an Ancient Tower. The books are decorated with gold and jewels, but fragile - reading them may end up destroying them. And they may be dangerous to read. What shall we do?
TEXT.Italian: We have discovered a cache of pre-Age of Ice books in an Ancient Tower. The books are decorated with gold and jewels, but fragile - reading them may end up destroying them. And they may be dangerous to read. What shall we do?
TEXT.Spanish: We have discovered a cache of pre-Age of Ice books in an Ancient Tower. The books are decorated with gold and jewels, but fragile - reading them may end up destroying them. And they may be dangerous to read. What shall we do?

TEXT.English: Have them sent - carefully - to our scholars for study.
TEXT.French: Have them sent - carefully - to our scholars for study.
TEXT.German: Have them sent - carefully - to our scholars for study.
TEXT.Italian: Have them sent - carefully - to our scholars for study.
TEXT.Spanish: Have them sent - carefully - to our scholars for study.

TEXT.English: Have them sent - carefully - to our priests and mystics for study.
TEXT.French: Have them sent - carefully - to our priests and mystics for study.
TEXT.German: Have them sent - carefully - to our priests and mystics for study.
TEXT.Italian: Have them sent - carefully - to our priests and mystics for study.
TEXT.Spanish: Have them sent - carefully - to our priests and mystics for study.

TEXT.English: Keep the gold and jewels, but burn the books just to be safe.
TEXT.French: Keep the gold and jewels, but burn the books just to be safe.
TEXT.German: Keep the gold and jewels, but burn the books just to be safe.
TEXT.Italian: Keep the gold and jewels, but burn the books just to be safe.
TEXT.Spanish: Keep the gold and jewels, but burn the books just to be safe.

TEXT.English: A sudden storm caught a number of our %s3_unit by surprise. They were all sunk or damaged beyond repair.
TEXT.French: A sudden storm caught a number of our %s3_unit by surprise. They were all sunk or damaged beyond repair.
TEXT.German: A sudden storm caught a number of our %s3_unit by surprise. They were all sunk or damaged beyond repair.
TEXT.Italian: A sudden storm caught a number of our %s3_unit by surprise. They were all sunk or damaged beyond repair.
TEXT.Spanish: A sudden storm caught a number of our %s3_unit by surprise. They were all sunk or damaged beyond repair.

TEXT.English: As it is said, anyone can steer a ship when the sea is calm.
TEXT.French: As it is said, anyone can steer a ship when the sea is calm.
TEXT.German: As it is said, anyone can steer a ship when the sea is calm.
TEXT.Italian: As it is said, anyone can steer a ship when the sea is calm.
TEXT.Spanish: As it is said, anyone can steer a ship when the sea is calm.

TEXT.English: Packs of wolves near the city of %s2_city have fed well on the local sheep flocks and grown very large and aggressive.
TEXT.French: Packs of wolves near the city of %s2_city have fed well on the local sheep flocks and grown very large and aggressive.
TEXT.German: Packs of wolves near the city of %s2_city have fed well on the local sheep flocks and grown very large and aggressive.
TEXT.Italian: Packs of wolves near the city of %s2_city have fed well on the local sheep flocks and grown very large and aggressive.
TEXT.Spanish: Packs of wolves near the city of %s2_city have fed well on the local sheep flocks and grown very large and aggressive.

TEXT.English: Those who cried wolf were telling the truth this time, I see.
TEXT.French: Those who cried wolf were telling the truth this time, I see.
TEXT.German: Those who cried wolf were telling the truth this time, I see.
TEXT.Italian: Those who cried wolf were telling the truth this time, I see.
TEXT.Spanish: Those who cried wolf were telling the truth this time, I see.

TEXT.English: Kill the pack leaders - then they shall be our pack of wolves.
TEXT.French: Kill the pack leaders - then they shall be our pack of wolves.
TEXT.German: Kill the pack leaders - then they shall be our pack of wolves.
TEXT.Italian: Kill the pack leaders - then they shall be our pack of wolves.
TEXT.Spanish: Kill the pack leaders - then they shall be our pack of wolves.

TEXT.English: Hire some adventurers to deal with them.
TEXT.French: Hire some adventurers to deal with them.
TEXT.German: Hire some adventurers to deal with them.
TEXT.Italian: Hire some adventurers to deal with them.
TEXT.Spanish: Hire some adventurers to deal with them.

TEXT.English: An immobile barbarian Wolf Pack appears.
TEXT.French: An immobile barbarian Wolf Pack appears.
TEXT.German: An immobile barbarian Wolf Pack appears.
TEXT.Italian: An immobile barbarian Wolf Pack appears.
TEXT.Spanish: An immobile barbarian Wolf Pack appears.

TEXT.English: Ships of the Lanun have arrived in our waters, seeking gold and plunder!
TEXT.French: Ships of the Lanun have arrived in our waters, seeking gold and plunder!
TEXT.German: Ships of the Lanun have arrived in our waters, seeking gold and plunder!
TEXT.Italian: Ships of the Lanun have arrived in our waters, seeking gold and plunder!
TEXT.Spanish: Ships of the Lanun have arrived in our waters, seeking gold and plunder!

TEXT.English: We must marshall our fleets to defeat these Lanun raiders.
TEXT.French: We must marshall our fleets to defeat these Lanun raiders.
TEXT.German: We must marshall our fleets to defeat these Lanun raiders.
TEXT.Italian: We must marshall our fleets to defeat these Lanun raiders.
TEXT.Spanish: We must marshall our fleets to defeat these Lanun raiders.

TEXT.English: Ships of the %s1_civ_adjective Empire have come under attack from [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lanun Raiders[COLOR_REVERT]!
TEXT.French: Les bateaux de l'empire de %s1_civ_adjective ont relevé de l'attaque des corsaires!
TEXT.German: Schiffe des %s1_civ_adjective Reiches sind unter Angriff von den Seeräubern gekommen!
TEXT.Italian: Le navi dell'impero di %s1_civ_adjective sono rientrato nell'attacco dai corsairs!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Las naves del imperio de %s1_civ_adjective han venido bajo ataque de los corsairs!

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]A dangerous number of so-called [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Lanun Privateer[COLOR_REVERT] units have gathered near our waters.
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Un nombre dangereux des [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Privateer[COLOR_REVERT] barbares est apparu de notre eaux.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Eine gefährliche Anzahl von barbarischen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Privateer[COLOR_REVERT] haben nahe unserem Wasser gelaicht.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Ai nostri confini c'è un pericoloso numero di [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Privateer[COLOR_REVERT] barbari.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Un número peligroso de unidades bárbaras de la [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Privateer[COLOR_REVERT] ha frezado cerca de nuestras aguas.

TEXT.English: A tribe of centaurs has claimed the local herds of horses and the land they graze on for their tribe solely. The centaurs ask only to be left alone.
TEXT.French: A tribe of centaurs has claimed the local herds of horses and the land they graze on for their tribe solely. The centaurs ask only to be left alone.
TEXT.German: A tribe of centaurs has claimed the local herds of horses and the land they graze on for their tribe solely. The centaurs ask only to be left alone.
TEXT.Italian: A tribe of centaurs has claimed the local herds of horses and the land they graze on for their tribe solely. The centaurs ask only to be left alone.
TEXT.Spanish: A tribe of centaurs has claimed the local herds of horses and the land they graze on for their tribe solely. The centaurs ask only to be left alone.

TEXT.English: No, we claim that land.
TEXT.French: No, we claim that land.
TEXT.German: No, we claim that land.
TEXT.Italian: No, we claim that land.
TEXT.Spanish: No, we claim that land.

TEXT.English: We will gladly let them manage the land there. In return we offer them protection and a place in our civilization.
TEXT.French: We will gladly let them manage the land there. In return we offer them protection and a place in our civilization.
TEXT.German: We will gladly let them manage the land there. In return we offer them protection and a place in our civilization.
TEXT.Italian: We will gladly let them manage the land there. In return we offer them protection and a place in our civilization.
TEXT.Spanish: We will gladly let them manage the land there. In return we offer them protection and a place in our civilization.

TEXT.English: We welcome all who seek help not from heaven but from themselves, and offer them our friendship.
TEXT.French: We welcome all who seek help not from heaven but from themselves, and offer them our friendship.
TEXT.German: We welcome all who seek help not from heaven but from themselves, and offer them our friendship.
TEXT.Italian: We welcome all who seek help not from heaven but from themselves, and offer them our friendship.
TEXT.Spanish: We welcome all who seek help not from heaven but from themselves, and offer them our friendship.

TEXT.English: If they will manage the herds for us, we will extend them our protection.
TEXT.French: If they will manage the herds for us, we will extend them our protection.
TEXT.German: If they will manage the herds for us, we will extend them our protection.
TEXT.Italian: If they will manage the herds for us, we will extend them our protection.
TEXT.Spanish: If they will manage the herds for us, we will extend them our protection.

TEXT.English: An immobile barbarian Centaur Archer appears.
TEXT.French: An immobile barbarian Centaur Archer appears.
TEXT.German: An immobile barbarian Centaur Archer appears.
TEXT.Italian: An immobile barbarian Centaur Archer appears.
TEXT.Spanish: An immobile barbarian Centaur Archer appears.

TEXT.English: The sea life is so bountiful off our coasts that a pod of sea serpents has made one of our most productive fishing areas their personal larder.
TEXT.French: The sea life is so bountiful off our coasts that a pod of sea serpents has made one of our most productive fishing areas their personal larder.
TEXT.German: The sea life is so bountiful off our coasts that a pod of sea serpents has made one of our most productive fishing areas their personal larder.
TEXT.Italian: The sea life is so bountiful off our coasts that a pod of sea serpents has made one of our most productive fishing areas their personal larder.
TEXT.Spanish: The sea life is so bountiful off our coasts that a pod of sea serpents has made one of our most productive fishing areas their personal larder.

TEXT.English: We will have to send our navy to deal with them.
TEXT.French: We will have to send our navy to deal with them.
TEXT.German: We will have to send our navy to deal with them.
TEXT.Italian: We will have to send our navy to deal with them.
TEXT.Spanish: We will have to send our navy to deal with them.

TEXT.English: An immobile Sea Serpent appears on the plot.
TEXT.French: An immobile Sea Serpent appears on the plot.
TEXT.German: An immobile Sea Serpent appears on the plot.
TEXT.Italian: An immobile Sea Serpent appears on the plot.
TEXT.Spanish: An immobile Sea Serpent appears on the plot.

TEXT.English: A motely collection of monkeys, apes, and gorillas has descended upon our banana crops, eating everything in sight.
TEXT.French: A motely collection of monkeys, apes, and gorillas has descended upon our banana crops, eating everything in sight.
TEXT.German: A motely collection of monkeys, apes, and gorillas has descended upon our banana crops, eating everything in sight.
TEXT.Italian: A motely collection of monkeys, apes, and gorillas has descended upon our banana crops, eating everything in sight.
TEXT.Spanish: A motely collection of monkeys, apes, and gorillas has descended upon our banana crops, eating everything in sight.

TEXT.English: Monkey see, monkey do, as the old saying goes.
TEXT.French: Monkey see, monkey do, as the old saying goes.
TEXT.German: Monkey see, monkey do, as the old saying goes.
TEXT.Italian: Monkey see, monkey do, as the old saying goes.
TEXT.Spanish: Monkey see, monkey do, as the old saying goes.

TEXT.English: A Gorilla appears on the plot.
TEXT.French: A Gorilla appears on the plot.
TEXT.German: A Gorilla appears on the plot.
TEXT.Italian: A Gorilla appears on the plot.
TEXT.Spanish: A Gorilla appears on the plot.

TEXT.English: The citizens of our settlement of %s2_city have constructed a small fishing fleet themselves to catch their plentiful fish.
TEXT.French: The citizens of our settlement of %s2_city have constructed a small fishing fleet themselves to catch their plentiful fish.
TEXT.German: The citizens of our settlement of %s2_city have constructed a small fishing fleet themselves to catch their plentiful fish.
TEXT.Italian: The citizens of our settlement of %s2_city have constructed a small fishing fleet themselves to catch their plentiful fish.
TEXT.Spanish: The citizens of our settlement of %s2_city have constructed a small fishing fleet themselves to catch their plentiful fish.

TEXT.English: The citizens of our settlement of %s2_city have constructed a small fishing fleet themselves to harvest their bountiful clam beds.
TEXT.French: The citizens of our settlement of %s2_city have constructed a small fishing fleet themselves to harvest their bountiful clam beds.
TEXT.German: The citizens of our settlement of %s2_city have constructed a small fishing fleet themselves to harvest their bountiful clam beds.
TEXT.Italian: The citizens of our settlement of %s2_city have constructed a small fishing fleet themselves to harvest their bountiful clam beds.
TEXT.Spanish: The citizens of our settlement of %s2_city have constructed a small fishing fleet themselves to harvest their bountiful clam beds.

TEXT.English: The citizens of our settlement of %s2_city have constructed a small fishing fleet themselves to harvest their abundant crabs.
TEXT.French: The citizens of our settlement of %s2_city have constructed a small fishing fleet themselves to harvest their abundant crabs.
TEXT.German: The citizens of our settlement of %s2_city have constructed a small fishing fleet themselves to harvest their abundant crabs.
TEXT.Italian: The citizens of our settlement of %s2_city have constructed a small fishing fleet themselves to harvest their abundant crabs.
TEXT.Spanish: The citizens of our settlement of %s2_city have constructed a small fishing fleet themselves to harvest their abundant crabs.

TEXT.English: That is the type of citizen initiative I like to hear about.
TEXT.French: That is the type of citizen initiative I like to hear about.
TEXT.German: That is the type of citizen initiative I like to hear about.
TEXT.Italian: That is the type of citizen initiative I like to hear about.
TEXT.Spanish: That is the type of citizen initiative I like to hear about.

TEXT.English: That is the type of citizen initiative I like to hear about.
TEXT.French: That is the type of citizen initiative I like to hear about.
TEXT.German: That is the type of citizen initiative I like to hear about.
TEXT.Italian: That is the type of citizen initiative I like to hear about.
TEXT.Spanish: That is the type of citizen initiative I like to hear about.

TEXT.English: That is the type of citizen initiative I like to hear about.
TEXT.French: That is the type of citizen initiative I like to hear about.
TEXT.German: That is the type of citizen initiative I like to hear about.
TEXT.Italian: That is the type of citizen initiative I like to hear about.
TEXT.Spanish: That is the type of citizen initiative I like to hear about.

TEXT.English: Workers expanding the dungeons of a %s8_improvement near the city of %s2_city have disturbed the mass grave of a pre-Age of Ice battleground. They have fled in terror, saying the vengeful dead are rising.
TEXT.French: Workers expanding the dungeons of a %s8_improvement near the city of %s2_city have disturbed the mass grave of a pre-Age of Ice battleground. They have fled in terror, saying the vengeful dead are rising.
TEXT.German: Workers expanding the dungeons of a %s8_improvement near the city of %s2_city have disturbed the mass grave of a pre-Age of Ice battleground. They have fled in terror, saying the vengeful dead are rising.
TEXT.Italian: Workers expanding the dungeons of a %s8_improvement near the city of %s2_city have disturbed the mass grave of a pre-Age of Ice battleground. They have fled in terror, saying the vengeful dead are rising.
TEXT.Spanish: Workers expanding the dungeons of a %s8_improvement near the city of %s2_city have disturbed the mass grave of a pre-Age of Ice battleground. They have fled in terror, saying the vengeful dead are rising.

TEXT.English: If the dead are rising then they can rise into our armies.
TEXT.French: If the dead are rising then they can rise into our armies.
TEXT.German: If the dead are rising then they can rise into our armies.
TEXT.Italian: If the dead are rising then they can rise into our armies.
TEXT.Spanish: If the dead are rising then they can rise into our armies.

TEXT.English: Send some well-guarded Spirit adepts there and have them calm the restless spirits for good.
TEXT.French: Send some well-guarded Spirit adepts there and have them calm the restless spirits for good.
TEXT.German: Send some well-guarded Spirit adepts there and have them calm the restless spirits for good.
TEXT.Italian: Send some well-guarded Spirit adepts there and have them calm the restless spirits for good.
TEXT.Spanish: Send some well-guarded Spirit adepts there and have them calm the restless spirits for good.

TEXT.English: Send some well-guarded Life adepts there and have them Sanctify the ancient mass grave.
TEXT.French: Send some well-guarded Life adepts there and have them Sanctify the ancient mass grave.
TEXT.German: Send some well-guarded Life adepts there and have them Sanctify the ancient mass grave.
TEXT.Italian: Send some well-guarded Life adepts there and have them Sanctify the ancient mass grave.
TEXT.Spanish: Send some well-guarded Life adepts there and have them Sanctify the ancient mass grave.

TEXT.English: Keep everyone out of there until we destroy those risen spirits.
TEXT.French: Keep everyone out of there until we destroy those risen spirits.
TEXT.German: Keep everyone out of there until we destroy those risen spirits.
TEXT.Italian: Keep everyone out of there until we destroy those risen spirits.
TEXT.Spanish: Keep everyone out of there until we destroy those risen spirits.

TEXT.English: An immobile barbarian Spectre appears.
TEXT.French: An immobile barbarian Spectre appears.
TEXT.German: An immobile barbarian Spectre appears.
TEXT.Italian: An immobile barbarian Spectre appears.
TEXT.Spanish: An immobile barbarian Spectre appears.
